description: The Eigerjoch IN Hybrid Vest Men from Mammut's Eiger Extreme collection. Performance-orientated insulated vest with stretch-fleece inserts for increased freedom of movement and breathability. The lining-free Polartec® Alpha® Direct insulating material offers heat retention without heat build-up. Practical: front pockets with cross-over access.
name: Mammut Eigerjoch IN Hybrid Vest - Mens
